website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Suede Classic gets its terry cloth treatment in this collectible sneaker. The Puma Suede Classic Terry comes in supple all-suede upper, a Formstrip in terry fabric, and a durable rubber sole and cushioning that has made this classic kick an enduring icon. While some think that there’s hardly any innovation introduced in this sneaker compared to the original, they believe that the new style treatment and value for money factor makes it a coveted casual sneaker.
pros: Some users find the Terry cloth Formstrip stylish and a unique treatment to the iconic Puma Suede silhouette
As in other iterations of the famous Puma Suede, reviewers disclosed how comfortable the shoe felt upon their first use
The Puma Suede Classic Terry has a durable solid rubber outsole that does not wear out for a long time many wearers commented
Several buyers disclosed that despite its cushioning material unchanged for years, the casual sneaker remained comfortable
Several purchasers find this as a great addition to their sneaker collection
A good number of commenters are impressed that this casual sneaker is flexible to mix and match with various clothing and style
The rich suede upper material felt smooth and doesn’t crease or wrinkle fast according to many customers
The casual sneaker fits well with the cushioned collar, the heel, and the spacious toe box several commenters posted
The low-top kick has a lower shaft from the arch allowing a variety of movement
Quite a lot of users love the vast array of colorways of the Puma Suede Classic Terry
Numerous comments noted how budget-friendly this particular sneaker is at $75 per pair
cons: Some are disappointed that Terry cloth at the Formstrip is challenging to clean as dirt sticks to them quickly compared to leather or other synthetic material
Aside from the Terry fabric in there’s hardly any innovation to this Puma Suede Classic iteration some buyers observed
The shoe runs large as some wearers commented that buying a size lower will get them a better fit
Some reviewers felt the shoe felt stiff after several uses and needs several days for break-in before getting comfortable

product_meta.title: Puma Men's Suede Classic Terry Fashion Sneaker, Toreador-Lapis Blue, 3.5 UK
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all PUMA shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the success of the German sports brand. This latest update offers a varsity-style inspired Formstrip in a contrasting color to the upper. The winter feel is undeniable
